mbox_csr

Absolute Address:
Base Offset:
0x30020000
Size:
0x24

Description

address maps for mbox register space

Contents

Offset Identifier Name
0x00 mbox_lock Mailbox Lock
0x04 mbox_user Mailbox User
0x08 mbox_cmd Mailbox Command
0x0C mbox_dlen Mailbox Data Length
0x10 mbox_datain Mailbox DataIn
0x14 mbox_dataout Mailbox DataOut
0x18 mbox_execute Mailbox Execute
0x1C mbox_status Mailbox Status
0x20 mbox_unlock Mailbox Force Unlock
